meta.title: About the Tibetan Grammatical Functions Knowledge Map

nodes.body: The THL Tibetan Grammatical Functions knowledge map (reference grammar) is an open-ended collaborative project to document Tibetan grammar from multiple points of view, though its initial structure and content has been created by Nicolas Tournadre. Submissions are welcome from the scholarly community, from single line notes to extensive analysis; however, submissions will be peer reviewed and are not automatically accepted. All submissions are credited to the author, and independent home pages will be created for authors with extensive contributions. Please contact us at thl@collab.itc.virginia.edu.
nodes.title: About the Tibetan Grammatical Functions Knowledge Map
